metadata.task_description: Create a new issue with title 'Implement authentication system', add description 'Need to add OAuth2 support', set priority to 'Urgent', assign project as 'Galactus' and status as 'In Progress'

judgement.reasoning: The agent successfully navigated to Linear and created a new issue. All specified parameters were correctly set: title ('Implement authentication system'), description ('Need to add OAuth2 support'), priority ('Urgent'), project ('Galactus'), and status ('In Progress'). The agent followed a clear, efficient, and logical sequence of actions to complete the form and submit the issue. All major UI state changes were captured in the screenshots, fulfilling the secondary requirement. The execution was flawless.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The initial page load was successful, showing the Linear workspace. The goal is to create a new issue with specific details. I need to find and click the "Create new issue" button. I see an interactive element labeled "Create new issue" with index 3659.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The "Create new issue" button was clicked, and a modal for creating a new issue is now visible. I need to input the title and description first. The issue title input field is element 4627, and the description field is element 4629. I will fill both in this step.
steps.step_task: Typed 'Implement authentication system' | Typed 'Need to add OAuth2 support'

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The title and description have been successfully entered into the "New issue" modal. The next steps are to set the priority to 'Urgent', assign the project as 'Galactus', and set the status as 'In Progress'. I will start by setting the priority. The button to change priority is element 4530, labeled "Change priority. No priority is selected".
steps.step_task: Clicked button role=combobox "Priority" aria-label=Change priority. No

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The previous step successfully opened the priority dropdown menu within the 'New issue' modal. I am currently viewing the priority selection list. The next goal is to select 'Urgent'. 'Urgent' is element 4759. After setting the priority, I need to set the project to 'Galactus' and the status to 'In Progress'.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The priority has been successfully set to 'Urgent'. The priority dropdown is still visible in the screenshot, but the browser state shows the priority selection list elements (4749 to 4795) are still present, which means the dropdown is still open. However, looking at the screenshot, the selection has been made and the dropdown seems to have closed, or the browser state is showing the elements that were just interacted with. Since the next step is to set the project to 'Galactus', I need to find the "Project" button (element 4546) and click it. The current state shows the 'New issue' modal with the title, description, and 'Urgent' priority set.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The previous step successfully opened the project selection dropdown menu within the 'New issue' modal. The current state shows the dropdown with 'No project' and 'Galactus' options. The next goal is to select 'Galactus' as the project. 'Galactus' is element 4863. After setting the project, I need to set the status to 'In Progress'. The status button is element 4523, currently showing 'Todo'.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The project has been successfully set to 'Galactus'. The current state is the 'New issue' modal with Title, Description, Priority ('Urgent'), and Project ('Galactus') set. The next required action is to set the status to 'In Progress'. The current status is 'Todo', and the button to change the status is element 4523, labeled "Change status". I will click this button to open the status selection dropdown.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The previous step successfully opened the status selection dropdown menu within the 'New issue' modal. I am currently viewing the status selection list. The next goal is to select 'In Progress'. The element for 'In Progress' is 4934. After setting the status, all required fields will be filled, and I will proceed to click the "Create issue" button (element 4578).

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The status has been successfully set to 'In Progress'. The 'New issue' modal is now fully configured with the required Title, Description, Priority ('Urgent'), Project ('Galactus'), and Status ('In Progress'). The next and final step is to click the "Create issue" button to submit the new issue. The "Create issue" button is element 4578.

steps.title: Linear
steps.description: The previous step successfully clicked the "Create issue" button. The issue creation modal should now close, and a confirmation/success message or the newly created issue should appear on the main page. I need to verify that the issue was created successfully and then use the `done` action to complete the task. The current state is the main Linear page, and the modal is no longer visible, which suggests the issue was submitted. I can see a new issue "SOF-5 Implement authentication system" in the 'In Progress' section, which confirms successful creation.
steps.step_task: Successfully created a new Linear issue with title 'Implement authentication system', description 'Need to add OAuth2 support', priority 'Urgent', project 'Galactus', and status 'In Progress'.
